item.description:
Race to Witch Mountain(2009)

Show time is 7:00 PM . Let's meet in the lobby around 6:45 PM. This will give us plenty of time to get our tickets, snack and find a seat.

Starring:: Carla Gugino, Ana Sophia Robb, Dwayne Johnson, Christin Laikin and Cheech Marin.

Synopsis: A UFO expert enlists the help of a cabbie to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi
Running Time: 99 min.
MPAA Rating: Rated PG for sequences of action and violence, frightening and dangerous situations, and some thematic elements.
Filming Locations: Agua Dulce, California

http://www.imdb.com/t...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Meet-up pin.
item.name: FAN Flick
